title: How to Spend a Comfortable Life as an Elf - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Comedy   Fantasy   Harem   Mature   Romance   Slice of Life   Yuri
tags: Childhood Friends   Co-Workers   Elemental Magic   Elves   Fantasy Creatures   Female Protagonist   Modern Day   Spirits
author: ぺるがもん
description:
Hitomi Shimotsuki, a new bank clerk, had lived a normal life… but when she woke up one day, she became an elf!

You can use magic because you are an elf. But what I want is a peaceful life.

My childhood friend is Trillionaire (above the billionaire).

Besides, high school girls and boobs sisters are aiming for the main character. Whether the yuri harem comes first or the peaceful days come first… Various myths come out.

The subtitles are based on anime.

In the end, except for the bad guys no one would be unhappy.>
